name: Perfect Smile
description:
The plaque just walks away!

Make beautiful, dazzling teeth appear from behind dingy old grins, in Perfect Smile! Examine the mouth of your patient to see what you can do to turn that frown, upside down. Clean, polish and pull away the plaque to make those teeth dazzle again!

Perfect Smile features:
-Free, fun game
-Be a dentist
-Play with teeth!
